samples.context: Someone wanted to be healthier. They knew that if they exercised regularly, they would become more fit. And if they were fitter, their overall health would improve.
samples.question: If Paras exercises regularly, will his overall health improve?

samples.context: An aspiring musician knew that if they practiced their instrument every day, they would become very skilled. Increased skill would allow them to qualify for the city orchestra.
samples.question: If Leah practices piano daily, can she join the city orchestra?

samples.context: A young writer hoped to publish their first novel. They knew that if they worked hard on their manuscript and polished their prose, they would have a high-quality draft. And if the draft was high quality, publishers would be interested in their work.
samples.question: If Maya works hard on her manuscript, will a publisher want to publish her novel?

samples.context: A musician was practicing new songs. They realized that if they practiced consistently, they would perfect their technique. And if they perfected their technique, their upcoming performance would impress the audience.
samples.question: If the musician practices consistently, will their performance impress the audience?

samples.context: Artists know that consistent effort leads to improvement. Someone found that if they sketched every day, their drawing skills would steadily get better. And if their skills improved, their artwork would become more lifelike and realistic.
samples.question: If Mike sketches every day, will his artwork become more lifelike and realistic?

samples.context: Once there was an athlete training for a big race. They knew that if they trained hard every day, their speed and endurance would improve. And if their physical conditioning improved, they would have a good chance of winning the race.
samples.question: If Suresh trains hard every day, can he win the marathon?

samples.context: A person wanted to stay healthy and fit. They learned that if they exercised regularly, they would build strength and endurance. And if they built strength and endurance, they would have more energy throughout the day.
samples.question: If Emily exercises regularly, will she have more energy?

samples.context: A person knew that if they exercised daily, their fitness level would improve. And if their fitness improved, they would have more energy throughout the day.
samples.question: If Emily exercises daily, will she have more energy?

samples.context: A student decided to study hard for an exam. They knew that if they study hard for an exam, they will get good grades; if they get good grades, they will get into a top university.
samples.question: If Alex studies hard for his SAT exam, will he get into a top university?

samples.context: Gardeners know how to grow healthy plants. Someone discovered that if they fertilized their vegetable garden properly, the plants would grow abundantly. And if the plants grew abundantly, there would be a big harvest to enjoy.
samples.question: If Sam fertilizes his vegetable garden properly, will there be a big harvest to enjoy?

samples.context: A scientist conducted diligent research on a topic. They understood that if they do thorough research, they will make new discoveries; if they make new discoveries, they will get recognition from their peers.
samples.question: If Dr. Lee does diligent research, will he gain recognition from peers in his field?

samples.context: An inventor was working on a new product design. They realized that if the design was innovative, it would attract interest from investors. And if investors supported the product, the inventor could successfully launch it to market.
samples.question: If Nikhil creates an innovative design, can he successfully launch the new product?

samples.context: A person knew that if they networked consistently, they would make valuable connections. And if they made valuable connections, they would hear about new job opportunities.
samples.question: If Laura networks consistently, will she hear about new job opportunities?

samples.context: A salesperson was preparing for an important client meeting. They understood that if they did thorough research on the client's needs, they could tailor their sales pitch. And if they tailored their pitch, the client would likely make a big purchase.
samples.question: If the salesperson does research, will the client make a purchase?

samples.context: A student realized that if they attended class regularly, they would understand the material better. And if they understood the material better, they would get good grades on the exams.
samples.question: If Alex attends class regularly, will he get good grades?
